ProjectTitle: The gut barrier as master regulator of microbiome-host interactions: exploring the structure and function of paracellular and transcellular transport in the large intestine.
InitialFeedbackHistory: 01/06/2022 3. [REDACTED] Please include the reference number of the privacy registration and approval. [REDACTED] ethics approvals are already a bit older, are these still valid, updated to comply with the GDPR and do these approvals also cover the secondary use of the patient samples/data in this project? [REDACTED] more information see: www.kuleuven.be/english/research/ethics/committees. 4. [REDACTED] MIBBI metadata standards may also be useful for your work, for example MISEQE and MIQE and see https://fairsharing.org/3518. 7. [REDACTED] sharing gene expression data there may still be a risk of re identifying the subjects, it is therefore recommended to share these data under restricted access in a [REDACTED] database such as EGA https://ega-archive.org; or see www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/ for more repositories.
